purpose: The email is a notification about a job opening for a Senior Lecturer in Computer Science with a specialization in AI Engineering at Karlstad University, Sweden. It provides details about the position, including application requirements, duties, and qualifications. The sender, Leonardo Iwaya, encourages colleagues to consider applying for this role within the Software Quality and Digital Modernization (SQuaD) group. The email also includes a link to the job posting and emphasizes the importance of collaboration and contribution to the academic community.

evidence_sentences: Considering applying to join the Software Quality and Digital Modernization (SQuaD) at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, Karlstad University (Sweden).
Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, Specialisation in AI Engineering
The Department of Mathematics and Computer Science hereby invites applications for a senior lectureship in Computer Science with a specialisation in AI Engineering.

The senior lecturer in AI Engineering will be an important person for further extending the expertise in the research group on Software Quality and Digital Modernization (SQuaD) and the overall department.
You are expected to conduct innovative research in AI Engineering contributing to SQuaD as well as to the overall department in collaboration with its other research groups.
To be eligible for the position of senior lecturer in Computer Science with a specialisation in AI Engineering, applicants are required to have documented pedagogical skills.
Submit the application via the Universityâ€™s web-based recruitment tool, Varbi.
